title: Can't clone or move a tenant
content:
You can't clone or move a tenant in Suite Administration.

Cause

The related pod is Offline or Pending.

Solution

  1. Run the kubectl get pod -n <NAMESPACE> | grep bo command to check the pod's status and see if any component is Offline or Pending.
    itom-bo-facade-deployment-<number>-<hash>
     itom-bo-ats-deployment-<number>-<hash>
  2. Run the kubectl get pod -n <NAMESPACE> | grep xruntime command to check the pod's status and see if any component is Offline or Pending.
    itom-xruntime-platform-<number>-<hash>
    itom-xruntime-ui-<number>-<hash>
  3. If there is any Offline bo pod, log in to a control plane node of the suite and run the kubectl logs <POD NAME> -n <NAMESPACE> -c <Container Name> command to check the log.
  4. If the platform pod is Offline, log in to a control plane node of the suite and  go to /var/vols/itom/itsma/logging-volume/xservices/ to check the maas log.
